metadata.title: CVE-2018-20199 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference was discovered in ifilter_bank oflibfaad/filtbank.c in Freeware Advanced Audio Decoder 2 (FAAD2) 2.8.8. Thevulnerability causes a segmentation fault and application crash, whichleads to denial of service because adding to windowed output is mishandledin the ONLY_LONG_SEQUENCE case.

criterions.comment: faad2 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
